253:1: parahitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante|
253:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila anyatamasmin nāgavane puṣpaphalapallavālakṣitaśikharairalaṃkṛta iva tatra taruvarataruṇairvividhavīruttarutṛṇapihitabhūmibhāge vanarāmaṇīyakanibaddhahṛdayairanutkaṇṭhitamadhyāsyamāna iva parvatasthalairāśrayabhūte vanacarāṇāṃ gambhīravipulasalilāśayasanāthe mahatā nirvṛkṣakṣupasalilena kāntāreṇa samantatastiraskṛtajanānte mahākāya ekacaro hastī babhūva|
253:4: sa tatra taruparṇena bisena salilena ca|
253:6: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvastasya vanasya paryante vicaran yatastatkāntāraṃ tato janaśabdamupaśuśrāva|
253:9: evaṃ mahatkāntāraṃ ca vyatītya mṛgayāpi na yujyate prāgeva mahāsamārambhaparikhedamasmatsayūthyagrahaṇam|
253:11: nirvāsitā vā kruddhena rājñā svenānayena vā||2||
253:14: tajjñāsyāmi tāvadenamiti sa mahāsattvaḥ karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇo yataḥ sa jananirghoṣo babhūva tataḥ prasasāra|
253:15: viṣpaṣṭataravilāpaṃ ca viṣādadainyavirasaṃ tamākranditaśabdamupaśṛṇvan kāruṇyaparyutsukamanāḥ sa mahātmā drutataraṃ tato'bhyagacchat|
253:16: nirgamya ca tasmādvanagahanānnirvṛkṣakṣupatvāttasya deśasya dūra evāvalokayan dadarśa saptamātrāṇi puruṣaśatāni kṣuttarṣapariśramamandāni tadvanamabhimukhāni prārthayamānāni|
253:17: te'pi ca puruṣāstaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dadṛśurjaṅgamamiva himagiriśikharaṃ hīnārapuñjamiva śaradvalāhakamiva pavanabalāvarjitamabhimukhamāyāntam|
253:18: dṛṣṭvā ca viṣādadainyaparītā hantedānīṃ naṣṭā vayamiti bhayagrastamanaso'pi kṣuttarṣapariśramavihatotsāhā nāpayānaprayatnaparā babhūvuḥ|
253:22: bhaiṣṭa na vo bhayamasti matta iti samucchritena snigdhābhitāmrapṛthupuṣkareṇa kareṇa samāśvāsayannabhigamya karuṇāyamāṇaḥ papraccha-ke'trabhavantaḥ ?
253:26: atha te puruṣāstasya tena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇābhayapradānābhivyañjakena cābhyupapattisaumukhyena pratyāgatahṛdayāḥ samabhipraṇamyainamūcuḥ-
253:32: svapne'pi tvadvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko hi nāpadamuttaret||8||
253:33: athainān sa dviradavara uvāca-atha kiyanto'trabhavanta iti ?
253:37: etāni tu syurdviradapradhāna saptāvaśeṣāṇi nṛṇāṃ śatāni|
253:38: nimajjatāṃ mṛtyumukhe tu yeṣāṃ mūrtastvamāśvāsa ivābhyupetaḥ||10||
253:41: ghṛṇāvimuktā bata nirvyapatrapā nṛpasya buddhiḥ paralokanirvyathā|
253:43: avaiti manye na sa mṛtyumagrataḥ śṛṇoti pāpasya na vā durantatām|
253:44: aho batānāthatamā narāḍhipā vimarśamāndyādvacanakṣamā na ye||12||
253:46: idaṃ sattveṣu nairghṛṇyaṃ dhigaho bata mūḍhatām||13||
253:47: atha tasya dviradapatestān puruṣān karuṇāsnigdhamavekṣamāṇasya cintā prādurabhūt evamamī kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍitāḥ paridurbalaśarīrā nirudakamapracchāyamanekayojanāyānaṃ kāntāramapathyādanāḥ kathaṃ vyatiyāsyanti ?
253:48: nāgavane'pi ca kiṃ tadasti yenaiṣāmekāhamapi tāvadaparikleśena vārtā syāt ?
253:49: śakyeyuḥ punarete madīyāni māṃsāni pātheyatāmupanīya dṛtibhiriva ca mamāntraiḥ salilamādāya kāntārametannistarituṃ nānyathā|
253:58: athainamanye kṣuttarṣaśramadharmaduḥkhāturaśarīrāḥ kṛtāñjalayaḥ sāśrunayanāḥ samabhipraṇamyārtatayā hastasaṃjñābhiḥ pānīyamayācanta|
253:59: tvaṃ no bandhurabandhūnāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ ca naḥ|
253:62: apare tvenaṃ dhīrataramanasaḥ salilapradeśaṃ kāntāradurgottāraṇāya ca mārgaṃ papracchuḥ-
253:63: jalāśayaḥ śītajalā saridvā yadyatra vā nairjharamasti toyam|
253:64: chāyādrumaḥ śādvalamaṇḍalaṃ vā tannod vipānāmadhipa pracakṣva||19||
253:66: anukampāṃ puraskṛtya tāṃ diśaṃ sādhu nirdiśa||20||
253:67: saṃbahulāni hi dinānyatra naḥ kāntāre paribhramatām|
253:69: atha sa mahātmā taiḥ karuṇaiḥ prayācitaisteṣāṃ bhṛśataramākleditahṛdayo yatastatkāntāraṃ śakyaṃ nistartu babhūva,
253:70: tata esāṃ parvatasthalaṃ saṃdarśayannabhyucchritena bhujagavarabhogapīvareṇa kareṇovāca-asya parvatasthalasyādhastātpadmotpalālaṃkṛtavimalasalilamasti mahatsaraḥ|
253:72: tatna ca vyapanītagharmatarṣaklamāstasyaiva nātīdūre'smātparvatasthalātpatitasya hastinaḥ śarīraṃ drakṣyatha|
253:73: tasya māṃsāni pātheyatāmānīya dṛtibhiriva tasyāntraiḥ salilamupagṛhyānayaiva diśā yātavyam|
253:75: iti sa mahātmā tān puruṣān samāśvāsanapūrvakaṃ tataḥ prasthāpya tato drutataramanyena mārgeṇa tadgiriśikharamāruhya tasya janakāyasya nistāraṇāpekṣayā svaśarīraṃ tato mumukṣurniyatamiti praṇidhimupabṛṃhayāmāsa-
253:76: nāyaṃ prayatnaḥ sugatiṃ mamāptuṃ naikātapatrāṃ manujendralakṣmīm|
253:77: sukhaprakarṣaikarasāṃ na ca dyāṃ brāhmīṃ śriyaṃ naiva na mokṣasaukhyam||11||
253:78: yatvasti puṇyaṃ mama kiṃcidevaṃ kāntāramagnaṃ janamujjihīrṣoḥ|
253:80: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā pramodādagaṇitaprapātaniṣpeṣamaraṇaduḥkhaṃ svaśarīraṃ tasmād giritaṭādyathoddeśaṃ mumoca-
253:97: tamarcituṃ bhaktivaśena kecana vyarāsayan dyāṃ suradundubhisvanaiḥ|
253:99: diśaḥ saratkāntimayīṃ dadhuḥ śriyaṃ raveḥ karāḥ prāṃśutarā ivābhavan|
253:101: atha te puruṣāḥ krameṇa tatsaraḥ samupetya tasmin vinītadharmatarṣaklamā yathākathitaṃ tena mahātmanā tadavidūre hastiśarīraṃ naciramṛtaṃ dadṛśuḥ|
253:103: bhrātā nu tasyaiṣa mahādvipasya syād bāndhavo vānyatamaḥ suto vā|
253:104: tasyaiva khalvasya sitādriśobhaṃ saṃcūrṇitasyāpi vibhāti rūpam||31||
253:107: atha tatraikeṣāṃ nipuṇataramanupaśyatāṃ buddhirabhavat-yathā paśyāmaḥ sa eva khalvayaṃ digvāreṇendrapratispardhirūpātiśayaḥ kuñjaravara āpadgatānāmabandhusuhṛdāmasmākaṃ nistāraṇāpekṣayā giritaṭādasmānnipatita iti|
253:117: ādeśayan mārgamimaṃ ca yenaḥ sa eṣa dīrghāṅgalipuṣkaraḥ karaḥ||36||
253:120: suhṛttvamasmāsu batedamīdṛśaṃ suhṛtsu vā bandhuṣu vāsya kīdṛśam|| 37||
253:125: na rūpaśobhā ramate vinā guṇairjano yadityāha tadetadīkṣyate||39||
253:130: atha tān bandhuvyasan eva śokānuvṛttipravaṇahṛdayān sāśrunayanān gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhānavekṣya kāryāntaramavekṣamāṇā dhīrataramanasa ūcuranye-na khalvevamasmābhirayaṃ dviradavaraḥ saṃpūjitaḥ satkṛto vā syāt|
253:140: nistīrya cedaṃ vyasanaṃ samagraiḥ pratyekaśo vā punarasya pūjā|
253:141: kariṣyate nāgavarasya sarvaṃ bandhoratītasya yathaiva kṛtyam||45||
253:142: atha te puruṣāḥ kāntāranistāraṇāpekṣayā tasya dviradapaterabhiprāyamanusmarantastadvacanamapratikṣipya tasya mahāsattvasya māṃsānyādāya dṛtibhiriva ca tadantraiḥ salilaṃ tatpradarśitayā diśā svasti tasmātkāntārādviniryayuḥ|
253:143: tadevaṃ parihitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante,
253:146: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe ca bhadraprakṛtiniṣpādanavarṇe'pi vācyam-evaṃ bhadrā prakṛtirabhyastā janmāntareṣvanuvartata iti|
253:148: yaccoktaṃ bhagavata parinirvāṇasamaye samupasthiteṣu divyakusumavāditrādiṣu-na khalu punarānanda etāvatā tathāgataḥ satkṛto bhavatīti,
